title: Hidden Talent Test
description: What hidden talent have you not yet discovered about yourself?

questions.question: What do you naturally do when you're alone?

choices.text: Hum songs or play an instrument

questions.question: What do your friends often say about you?

choices.text: Fix or make things with my hands

questions.question: What content do you mainly watch on YouTube or Netflix?
What activities did you enjoy as a child?
What do you usually choose when giving gifts?
What do you want to do when stressed?

choices.text: Listen to music or play an instrument

questions.question: What's your preferred way of learning new things?
When do you feel most proud?

choices.text: When I complete a creative work
When I finish a performance or presentation well
When I persuade or help someone
When I solve a difficult problem

results.title: Artistic Creativity
results.description: Your hidden talent is artistic creativity! You see the world from a unique perspective and have the ability to create original ideas and beauty. You can shine in visual arts fields like design, photography, and video.
results.advice: Share your creative ideas with the world. Try expressing them through various media like art, photography, and video.

results.title: Musical Sense
results.description: Your hidden talent is musical sense! Sensitive to rhythm and melody, you have the ability to express and convey emotions through music. You can showcase your talent in music fields like playing instruments, composing, and singing.
results.advice: Try learning an instrument you like or start singing. Music can also help relieve stress.

results.title: Craftsmanship
results.description: Your hidden talent is craftsmanship! You excel at making and fixing things with your hands. You can shine in practical fields like DIY, crafts, cooking, and repairs.
results.advice: Start hobbies that involve working with your hands. Explore various fields like woodworking, knitting, and cooking.

results.title: Writing & Storytelling
results.description: Your hidden talent is writing! You excel at expressing thoughts and emotions through words. You can move people's hearts through various forms of writing like novels, poetry, essays, and blogs.
results.advice: Try writing a little every day. Any form is good - journals, blogs, short stories.

results.title: Communication & Persuasion
results.description: Your hidden talent is communication! You excel at talking to people and persuading them. You can shine in people-oriented fields like public speaking, negotiation, counseling, and sales.
results.advice: Look for debate clubs or presentation opportunities. Podcasts and YouTube can also be a good start.

results.title: Analysis & Logic
results.description: Your hidden talent is analytical ability! You excel at logically analyzing and solving complex problems. You can shine in fields like research, data analysis, and strategy development.
results.advice: Try analyzing data in areas that interest you. Learning programming or statistics could also be beneficial.
